questions:
What is the main subject of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A building with a clock tower
C) A crowded street
D) A river

What is at the top of the building in the photo?
A) A flag
B) A statue
C) A weather vane
D) A satellite dish

What type of building is depicted in the photo?
A) A modern skyscraper
B) A historical clock tower
C) A residential house
D) A shopping mall

What is the architectural style of the building in the photo?
A) Gothic
B) Baroque
C) Romanesque
D) Modern

Which element is prominently displayed on the building in the photo?
A) A large window
B) A digital screen
C) A clock face
D) A mural

What time is shown on the clock in the photo?
A) 3:55 or 11:15
B) 6:00
C) 9:00
D) 12:00

What is the statue on top of the building doing?
A) Holding a flag
B) Pointing upwards
C) Running
D) Sitting

What can be seen in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Other buildings
C) A body of water
D) The sky

What is the shape of the roof of the building in the photo?
A) Flat
B) Dome-shaped
C) Pyramidal
D) Gabled

What is the position of the clock on the building?
A) Near the base
B) In the middle
C) At the top
D) At the side

What is the architectural feature below the clock in the photo?
A) Arched windows
B) A balcony
C) A door
D) A staircase

What is the predominant color of the sky in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Grey
C) Orange
D) Pink

What is the shape of the windows below the clock?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Arched
D) Triangular

What is the color of the statue on top of the building?
A) Bronze
B) Silver
C) Gold
D) Black

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Trees
B) A road
C) Another building
D) A park

What is the building's roofline like?
A) Flat and even
B) Steep and varied
C) Curved and smooth
D) Jagged and irregular

How many windows are visible below the clock?
A) Two
B) Three
C) Four
D) More than Five

What is the position of the statue relative to the clock?
A) Directly above
B) To the left
C) To the right
D) Below

What is the color of the roof in the photo?
A) Green
B) Red
C) Blue
D) Grey

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Bird's eye view
B) Eye level
C) Low angle
D) High angle

What is the architectural feature at the very top of the building?
A) A spire
B) A dome
C) A flat roof
D) A terrace

What is the primary focus of the photo?
A) The surrounding landscape
B) The clock tower
C) The people around
D) The traffic

What is the sky's appearance in the photo?
A) Clear and blue
B) Partially cloudy
C) Overcast
D) Stormy

What is the building's texture?
A) Smooth and sleek
B) Rough and rustic
C) Polished and shiny
D) Textured and detailed

What is the general shape of the building in the photo?
A) Cylindrical
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Square

What is the architectural style of the windows below the clock?
A) Gothic
B) Classic
C) Modern
D) Industrial

What is the base material of the roof?
A) Wood
B) Tile
C) Metal
D) Concrete

What is surrounding the building in the photo?
A) A forest
B) A river
C) Other buildings
D) A field

What is the building's condition in terms of maintenance?
A) Newly built
B) Well-preserved
C) Neglected
D) Under renovation

What is the likely purpose of the clock tower?
A) Decorative
B) Functional timekeeping
C) Historical landmark
D) All of the above

What is the color of the windows below the clock?
A) Black
B) White
C) Blue
D) Green

What is the position of the clock hands in the photo?  
A) Both at 12  
B) Both at 6  
C) At 11 and 3  
D) At 9 and 12

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) From the ground looking up
B) From above looking down
C) Straight on
D) From the side

What is the detail of the clock face?
A) Roman numerals
B) Arabic numerals
C) No numbers
D) Digital display

What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
